title: KAWAII CHIBI CREATOR
description: Create your own Chibi character in this kawaii avatar game! There's a huge variety of items and colors in several categories: go for a more realistic look for male or female Chibis or design a cute fantasy outfit - it's all about your creativity. Customize the hairstyle, clothes, body, accessories or background and impress your friends with your styling skills. Hit the randomizer to get some inspiration and have hours of fun with this adorable dress up game!
